Double-click on the "browsermator.jar" file to run.  (executable jar)
=======
Double-click on the "BrowserMator.jar" file to run.  (executable jar)
>>>>>>> a82ddc4fe8b909fedd634d9f0cdf1cffedf1a5c2

Args are "open" and "run"... "run" will open and run all tests...
so if you extracted this file to c:\apps,  the run command would look like this:

c:\apps\browsermator.jar run [path]\your_filename.browsermation
